unnormalised: Campus hiring is crucial for talent acquisition. Dr. Sharma's recent address highlighted its importance for fresh perspectives. We aim to visit IIT Delhi and IIM Ahmedabad this year. The package starts at Rs. 8 lakhs per annum plus benefits. Our new Bangalore office offers 2000 sq ft of collaborative space. We expect a diverse talent pool this season, mirroring India's rich culture. A thorough background check is mandatory.
